case.state: There has to be an akuma, Cat Noir! Let's take it down!
I think Deadly Dealer is here, Cat Noir! We have to protect everyone!
You're lucky you've got nine lives, Kitty. If this is a trick to get into my suit... well, you'll see.
This is where the Akuma flew, right? Don't worry, everyone, Ladybug's here to keep you safe!
Je vais te défendre--! Ladybug's here to keep you safe-- Um, did you all see a purple butterfly or a supervillain come this way?
Tikki said there were lots of embarrassed people here for some reason...I should find out why.
Cat Noir! Let's figure out why there's so many embarrassed people here!
Cat Noir! Voyons pourquoi les émotions sont si intenses dans cet endroit!
O-oh... well... this is different than the games we usually play. Are you sure there's an akuma here, kitty...?
Salut ~name~!
Bonjour, ~name~.
Ah, this is embarassing but, er, nǐ hǎo ma?
Fàguó de wènhòu-- salutations de la france-- greetings from France, ~name~!
A magical girl? Do you already have a miraculous, or are we just here to team up?
It's always great to meet another magical girl-- even given the circumstances! Let's make sure to catch up after the game. We only have one world to save, after all!
Blue hair...? Is that natural or dyed, ~name~? I always get let down by bluenettes.
Oh! I hope your hair's natural! It's so hard to find someone else to talk to about it! It never seems like any salons cater to people like us, ~name~!
Twintails never go out of style, do they, ~name~?
So, I call my hairstyle nattesdouble-- but no matter the language, it's universally cute, isn't it?
I know bodysuits are rather flattering... but... what do you do, professionally, ~name~?
Another person in a bodysuit? That's nice... but I don't know who you are... are you a hero or a villain, ~name~?
Hey! Pardon if this is rude, but are you mixed? It's so nice to meet people with diverse backgrounds!
Oh! Where are you from, ~name~? Or which places might be a better question?
Hm... I saw you get off the phone with someone and they sounded pretty special... I see you're happy with unconventional forms of romance, at least...
So... I take it you and your... I heard you before you came in and-- you're happy with more... open forms of romance too, aren't you, ~name~?
Oh! I've been coming here for a few years at this point... usually we get folks from Japan that are... just as animated as you, ~name~. It's nice to see other representatives here too!
Oh! I'm representing something similar to what you are, ~name~. Most of the folks here are from anime. But anime and cartoons are pretty much the same, huh?
Oh? You have some kind of companion, ~name~? ...Well, you can't see her yet, but Tikki's here with me, too!
Hm... where'd you get your special friend, ~name~? I'll introduce Tikki to your friend if I lose a few rounds.
That must be him! Okay, Duplicitous Dealer, we'll get your akuma and send you back home-- no more stripping for you!
~Player~ must have been akumatized! Cat Noir, let's put a stop to this Duplicitous Dealer!
Strip poker? Aren't there better ways of seeing a superhero naked?
Huh? Strip poker...? Well... trust me when I tell you that luck's on my side.
A game of strip poker? Forward of you... but I can play along.
O-oh! This is strip poker? Well... if there's no akuma... I suppose if it keeps people happy, then there won't be an akumatization.
~Cards.text~, please. You’d think red and black would be lucky for me...
~Cards.text~, s'il vous plaît. I’m getting ticklish.
Hmm... any help here, Tikki? You did say there were embarrassed people... 『{Tikki}Hmm... ~cards.text~, when you put it like that.{!reset}』
I-I really could use ~cards.text~. But can I ask for even more?
Well, I know that ~cards.text~'d be good here. So I have that, at least. ...And everyone's attention.
~Cards.text~ cards, s'il vous plaît .
Hmm... I think I need ~cards.text~ more!
~Cards.text~ would really help.
...No Lucky Charm yet. ~Cards~.
It’s no lucky charm, but ~cards.text~ might be exactly what I need.
I’d like ~cards.text~, de toi.
After that play, I want ~cards.text~ to be safe!
Okay, dealer! I'm not out yet! ~Cards~!
Dealer, sans déc. ~Cards~.
Erk, I’m running out of hands. ~cards~, please.
It’s no lucky charm, but ~cards.text~ might be exactly what I need.
~Cards.text~ would help, right, Tikki? 『{Tikki}...I'm not very good at cards, Marinette. But I think you could use more red ones.{!reset}』
You don't have to stare, you know! Um... at my... cards!
I may be a baker's daughter... but I have a feeling that people here are a little more interested in other buns...
Hey, um... seriously, has anyone seen that butterfly around? I'm not losing anytime soon and I'd... I'll stick around for the next hand, at least...
Oui, on l’attend.
Well, a ladybug can't change her spots. But it looks like my luck's turning around!
Ah, Tikki, this is getting stressful! Thank goodness I got a good hand! 『{Tikki}That Akuma could still be around, Marinette! Keep focused!{!reset}』
Oh no! The cards are really good! Oh no! The cards are really good! I'm-- um... nevermind! Sorry!
...(Hm. Looks like I win again. Do they think I'm a cheater? I know I'm not, but... how do you explain...?)
It's not the Arc du Triomphe... but you can appreciate the view, right?
Gotcha!
Zut. It's almost a shame to win the hand. I'm actually really impressed with the fashion on display here...
Allons ! If there's an Akuma here-- or any villain-- Ladybug'll keep everyone safe!
I got a lot of really good cards. Is this really fair? Or... sensible?
Looks like luck's on my side. Just like always.
You know, if you're trying to get my Miraculous, you're going to have to try a game that's not luck based.
Come on! Looks like Hawk Moth hardly thought this plan through.
Ha! And I bet you thought I'd be worse at this without my costume! Well, this hand's amazing!

I'm not one to brag, but this hand's just about perfect.
Well, I'll brag about my baking. Aaand my designwork.
Amuses toi bien?
I'd much rather try out one of the modern clubs in Paris. If you want to play a game there, it's probably a video game.
Don't worry, everyone. Even if you lose, Ladybug's still here to protect you.

See, Tikki, I have this totally under control!
『{Tikki}Marinette, there's a lot of luck in this game, and you're not transformed right now... But let's enjoy the small things?{!reset}』
This hand's really good! B-but you know what else is really good? A fresh brioche roll! A-and not making superheroes strip naked...
Zut. This hand's nice, but am I getting it in too? I-I mean, t-too into it?
You know, you can relax, Dealer. I know you're probably not a villain. You don't need to giving me good hands.
This hand's fantastic. You think a fashion line for the Inventory would be successful?
Looks like I'm going to be just fine.
Everyone's in good hands with Ladybug, and Marinette's got a good hand here!

...So, I was thinking. Maybe we should be considerate and... um...
I was trying to get out of losing again but...
W-when it comes to being a trendsetter, I'd have liked to have been known for my heroics-- or at least my fashion sense!
C’est tout? That’s it? How can I win with this?
Definitely not thinking of the headlines: Ladybug unmasked! Shows her body to strange men and women in an otherwordly ~background~!
I'm a hero. It's always nice to service others... but maybe if I service myself, that'd make things... maybe everyone would be less likely to be akumatized...
Tikki! I can hardly look at these cards! 『{Tikki}Mmm... I think you'll be okay? You've been successful with way less than this before! {!reset}』 Thanks, Tikki.
The dealer's the real hero with this hand!
If you win this one... I guess it's a fair win. So... I've worked hard on my figure, so maybe I shouldn't be so embarrassed.

This hand's fantastique!
...Okay. That was a lie. But it's not over yet!
As exciting as this hand is--or isn't-- there's such an interesting collection of fashions here tonight!
Comment? Pardon? I was... a little... distracted! I think I'll be okay, though.
Next time, maybe we should play for food. I happen to know of an excellent boulangerie.
Hm... this hand's not simply the best. Well, you know what they say: crisis and opportunity are just a matter of perspective.
T’es large, chacun !
(I want to make sure I keep my powers active, so I can protect everyone here... but... do I want to force everyone to lose?)
...Well, at the very least, I'll be making a lot of new friends tonight, won't I?
Well. No buns coming out of the oven this round, at least. Or my pants, really.

Il y a quelques minutes j'étais encore Ladybug
My luck was so much better.
Do you think there's strip versions of other games...? Hm... how'd that work though...?
Hm... you know, is there a way for us to suit back up...? Worth a shot, right, Tikki...? 『{Tikki}Just keep your head, and this'll be a piece of cake! {!reset}』

『{Tikki}Are you nervous, Marinette? Those cards aren't...{!reset}』 T-they're fine, Tikki! 『{Tikki}...I was trying to help you bluff! {!reset}』
Zut.
I'm kind of awkward at the best of times, but... 『{Tikki}It might be better if you stay confident, Marinette!{!reset}』
Merde. I'm not having a terrible time but this is so embarrassing!
...Maybe I should design some cute underwear... with hands like these at least I could show something off...
Sans déc! Fais gaffe !
S-so what if I lose the hand? People do this all the time. Just... think of it like posing for artwork... (Or Adrien...)
...Looks like my luck's run out.,. ah, j-just don't stare too much.
Maybe if I eye their clothes-- close my eyes-- hide my thighs-- aaaah-- 『{Tikki}Marinette, you have to keep focused!{!reset}』
Tikki, they're going to see me-- my-- 『{Tikki}Marinette, they've seen pretty much everything already! ...Besides, I'm naked all the time! Be confident!{!reset}』
Hm? What? Show our hands? Mmm... W-well, you can clearly see mine. My hands! You can see them. Y-you definitely don't need to look at my cards! Nope, absolutely not a losing hand!
Well, fine. It's not like I'm responsible for driving down crime in Paris, but sure, let's get me to undress.
...Oh. Well, this is bad... um... did I see some pastries? I might need those. For a friend.
Quoi ? Tu blagues.
If the villain's name is Card Shark, I am going to be so mad.
...Don't worry, everyone! I'll make sure to protect you from losing... this round, at least!
At least nobody's demanding I take off my Miraculous. I think there's probably worse outcomes here than just trying on another set of clothes...
I was too busy looking for the akuma and swapped the wrong cards! Zut!
A secret identity doesn't do much good if it's not a secret... but maybe I can be myselff a bit more... if I lose this hand...
Unbelievable! I keep getting terrible cards! This is ridiculous! Utt-- totally ridiculous.
This hand's a stale baguette-- you know, hard and-- u-uhm. F-forgive me, the context and English-- I-I'm not making a euphemism, you're a euphemism!
C'est des conneries-- ! Um... pardon my French.
Tikki-- we can fix anything bad with Lucky Charm, right? 『{Tikki}Well, if it is Hawk Moth--{!reset}』 What do you mean if!? This hand is awful and I'm going to have to--!
Okay, Marinette, you're a hero! The Miraculous Ladybug! You're not going to let a bad hand and some bad cards-- W-was I talking out loud...? I-I was!?
Tikki, I don't suppose you have any secret wisdom to get me out of this? 『{Tikki}Marinette, I'm not going to help you cheat!{!reset}』
Um... now's not the best time but... c-could we-- c-could we maybe just... not play this hand? Ahaha, I think I saw the Akuma over there and--
Oh, zut. That was... not the card I wanted to give away.

You've met Tikki... but you can call me Marinette now. 『{Tikki}Wait a second-- aren't you worried about your secret identity!?{!reset}』 Don't worry. This place is pretty safe! Haven't been caught yet, have I?

Tikki, I can use a Lucky Charm if this really goes south, oui? 『{Tikki}I guess you could...{!reset}』 Well then, tout le monde peut m’appeler Marinette. We'll remember everything, but I just want to make sure people aren't hurt.

『{Tikki}Have you told anyone your real name? You can't reset it with a Lucky Charm...{!reset}』 Well, I'm Marinette, everyone-- w-wait-- c-can you reset it, Tikki? 『{Tikki}...You should really know your limits, Marinette.{!reset}』

『{Tikki}If you lose again, I'll just wait for you outside...{!reset}』
Thank goodness... it'd be really uncomfortable if you waited around... 『{Tikki}...We should talk about when you need privacy...{!reset}』

Tikki, I might lose... and... 『{Tikki}...Not to embarass you but it's... kind of obvious when you're... practicing self-love. I'll do what I usually do and just step outside...{!reset}』
...Merci...
『{Tikki}...I'll stick around until you lose but...{!reset}』 Um... it would probably be for the best if you left if that happens...
But that would just leave ~player~ and I to... Hm. ~Player~, how does that sound to you?
This'll be interesting, if nothing else...
He's great to practice flirting with, Ringo, and I'm here if things get too spicy.
The only dark secret I have is that I might know a little more about Cat Noir's identity than I let on...
I don't really have any dark secrets. I'm not some secretly tortured young woman.
I don't think that's particularly dark or secret, Adrien. I could say I've done the same thing.
Well... I know you were looking for a dark secret, but I know that Adrien and I will always work together. I think his counts enough for both of us.
Oh, you're a paragon of honesty, aren't you, Cat Noir, who I definitely know nothing about behind the mask.
I'm not a liar! Not anymore than you are, Kitty!
A-Adrien, hey, wait a second-- that Lila person seems just awful. But I'm not deliberating lying to you-- because... e-er... I'm not deliberately lying to you...
Lila sure does sound an awful lot like liar. So... it's a really unflattering comparison!
I don't know about Cat Noir... but I think if someone was dating me, they'd have to have that kind of relationship. After all, Ladybug and Marinette are pretty different.

If you date me, you're basically dating two people with very different lives... so if you can manage that, it's kind of nice to know that you're with someone who can take care of themselves when you're saving the city.
Well... Adrien and I have that sort of relationship. We both just spent so much time falling in love with our hero and normal selves that... well, you do kind of get used to that sort of thing.
Cat Noir and Adrien are so different... so... as long as you come home to eat, it's okay if you enjoy all the flavors of Paris on occasion, oui?
She's not all that different from a female version of you, is she? Well, as Cat Noir, anyway... I can watch, right? Just don't mind me if I groan at the puns.
Being a real tom cat today, aren't you, Kitty? Fine, but if you come home even punnier than usual, don't be surprised if I chuck you back into an alley.
Rouge, if it helps, I'm not going to sleep with tonight either. He's in the catbox tonight.
W-whoa... uh... there's no way I could do something like that? Unless maybe I used Kaalki to... no... that wouldn't work...

Tikki, there's no Miraculous power that'd let me...? 『{Tikki}Marinette... you don't want to decollate, do you? And pretty please, don't involve the Kwamis with you and Adrien... more than you have to...{!reset}』 You're right...
...I almost think it'd be better if you were direct about that sort of thing, Kitty. I've seen my reflection when I'm suited up, you know...
You can ask us whatever, Meia. I'm sure neither of us would be terribly offended.
I think we have a fairly unusual situation. And you're not too far off his type, so... I'd love to see how he responds.
Give it a try, Ringo!
Kitty? She's... quite a bit bustier than me, is that... a problem?
Well... she is a professional but... we are built really different... so...

U-um... when I was younger I stole a lot of phones. I gave them back! B-but... I-I probably shouldn't have done that.
I-I didn't know you even had a phone. A-and if I'd stolen it, wouldn't you have known, Kitty?

I... may have kind of sort stolen a lot of phones in order to delete embrrassing messages when I was younger. I gave them back but it's not an excuse...
As bad as I am now, Kitty, it was s-so much worse!
Just because she does it doesn't mean it's something I want to do, Kitty. It's fine if you can enjoy yourself that way, but I can't.
Tu ne vas pas me le mettre dans me cul. I suppose it's that time of month and the time for the same monthly answer.
There has to be something more comfortable than your hand, Kitty. As for me, Only every couple days if I haven't... finished.
If I'd have known that, Kitty, I... er... w-well, I'm sure there's a way to fix that frequency. I don't need as much... but I don't mind more.
Don't let him give you the wrong idea, Nami. We're partners first and foremost.
While I appreciate the compliment, he's going to be scratching at my post all night, now, Nami.
Don't say I never backed you up, Kitty, but give him a chance, won't you, Ibuki?

state.text: About birth control... a man who finishes inside of you can get you pregnant. So... you need something to stop that from happening if you don't want to risk a child but still want to be intimate...

Oh, Meia, about birth control. When a man climaxes inside of you... that's how you fall pregnant. So you need to either not be able to become pregnant, or block... um... you can't have him fully finish in you.

case.state: Ah, wait! You didn't have to--
Oh... um... K-Komi-san, I didn't imply that you're mean-- mean to imply--
...Is he even a villain? Cat Noir, did you bring me to a strip poker game?
Is--Is the Dealer really Akumatized? Or is this just an excuse to--
To think, this villain's actually going to be using Strip Poker... Cat Noir, we need to be careful or we'll reveal our secret identities!
Cat Noir...! Don't lose again, I can see your Miraculous is running out of time!
You're almost out of time! Now's the time to use the hand you're dealt!
A-Adri-- you-- Oh... I-I never would've guessed it was the famous model, Adrien Agreste...
Cat Noi-- Adrien! You have to be more careful! ...Let's just hope I can win this while I still have my yo-yo...
I'm aware that I'm the lucky one, but... This is quite the lead.
I didn't really expect to be doing this much better, Adrien-- C-Cat Noir...
Well... it's good to know that the smell really is cheese! It's nice to see Plagg. A bit more than your toes, anyway.
Plagg, care to spoil the rest of us on whatever else he's wearing?
...A-Adrien, if you lose anymore, that'll make this really distracting...
Y-you can't keep losing! I'll... get distracted!
Your costume hardly shows off your best traits...
...I guess my costume's maybe a little more revealing...
Adrien, you... you didn't throw the game to protect me, or something like that, did you?
Wow... I finally found something you're bad at... who'd've thought it was poker.
I'm not even-- I haven't... A-Adrien! B-be careful!
A-Adrien! I'm still-- I haven't... I haven't even de-transformed! W-what's the rush?
So nice of you to join me, Cat Noir!
We might not have our weapons, but we're not out of this yet. C'mon, Kitty!
A-Adrien...? O-of course I wondered but...
If I'm not careful, I'll be joining you... but... given that it's you, maybe it isn't so bad...
Thanks for the save Cadrien. Cat Agreste. Adrien!
I-I'm getting a little more flustered than I want over here... c-can you take off less...? I can hardly focus on my cards!
Cat Noir! You have to stay transformed! We're in this together, but if we both lose our powers--
If we both get de-transformed, who's going to fight the Dealer?! C-Cat Noir!

state.text: Well... if we're both unmasked, it's okay if we stop pretending... right, Kitty? 『{Tikki}I'm not sure that's such a great idea... but... it's good see you too, Plagg. {!reset}』
『{Tikki}Plagg, don't encourage them!{!reset}』 Oh... it's okay, Tikki. It's not like this place isn't used to secret identities and that sort of stuff...
『{Tikki}If you get distracted now, Marinette, how are you going to win?{!reset}』 I think I'm winning plenty tonight...
Adrien... and he's taking off his clothes... for me... 『{Tikki}This is an almost nightly occurrence, it's kind of surprising that it still...{!reset}』 It just makes it more magical... ahhh...

case.state: You're really trying your best to keep up with me, aren't you, Kitty?
It's a pretty close game... we should worry about the Akuma... but at least you're doing better than how you usually do when we play.
Adrien, I really hope you're not taking it easy on me. You know I'm a lot better than you at games.
You can't be good at everything, can you, Adrien? But... I still find you plenty charming. Maybe even a bit more if you keep losing.
I'm... really not all that far behind you, Adrien... but...
Quelle différence a few layers can make...
...I waited quite a while to see you naked the first time. I'm a little jealous that everyone else gets a faster look... but just a little.
Have you gotten more handsome, lately? Or maybe it's just our circumstances...
Were we supposed to theme our underwear tonight? I just did laundry...
I see you ended up theming your underwear after your costume... are you sure you didn't plan for tonight to be a game of strip poker...?
We'll figure out a way to get that villain... I think you're going to be busy soon, Adrien.
Adrien, next time you want to bring me to a game of cards, maybe you should learn the rules. Ladybug can save Cat Noir, but aren't you supposed to be saving me?
Look at us, getting comfortable, and stretching our toes.
Aren't we a perfect match, my prince?

state.text: Hi there, handsome... it's no secret that the secret identity roleplay is fun, oui? 『{Tikki}...There are more than just the four of us here, you know! Now's hardly the time for the reveal, Marinette!{!reset}』
『{Tikki}Marinette... aren't you both supposed to maintain your secret identities?{!reset}』 He's just so handsome! I'm not going to not treat him like my boyfriend...

case.state: C-Cat Noir, y-you have to game the win Akuma-- g-get the Akuma and win the game!
K-Keep it together, Cat Noir! It's up to you to win!
Adr-- C-Cat Noir, I'm really getting cornered here--
You're... playing a lot better than you usually-- than I'd expect you too, Cat Noir... where's that bad luck when I need it?

state.text: I knew better than to expect you'd leave me hanging, Adrien. 『{Tikki}Nice to see you too, Plagg.{!reset}』
If I'd taken my shirt off before you de-transformed, I'd have been left wondering, you know! 『{Tikki}Plagg, you didn't get lazy and de-transform, did you?{!reset}』

case.state: And I thought you were going to be a copycat.
Changing things up on us, Adrien?
All tied up now, Kitty. Let's keep things interesting!
So good of you to join me... I'm counting... four more layers for you?
...I'm getting a little jealous now...
I get the next view all to myself most of the time... but...

state.text: 『{Tikki}Marinette, you'll lose if you get distracted!{!reset}』 I feel like I'm already winning, though...
『{Tikki}Marinette... are you sure you should be staring at Adrien instead of your cards...?{!reset}』 He's my boyfriend, I can stare as much as I like.

case.state: You know, I might be a stuttering mess if this wasn't a competition, Adrien.
Good thing this is a competition, or I might become the usual mess I am around you.
Cat Noir! I might not be suited up, but I could really use some help!
Don't be a sore winner, Kitty!

state.text: Finally, Adrien. You really kept me waiting! 『{Tikki}Hi, Plagg. Let me know if they ever have a different reaction...{!reset}』
『{Tikki}Marinette! Focus! {!reset}』 ...But... Adrien...

case.state: I'm suddenly very aware of how far ahead you are, Adrien...
Not that I'm not having fun but... you're really kicking my butt here. I'm not used to-- well... not usually used to having to beat you in something...
Took you long enough, but you're finally catching up, Kitty.
Well, Kitty, are you in a rush to join me, or getting nervous about having to show one of us off? ...Or both.
Well, look at that. We're all tied up, Adrien.
Adrien, so nice of you to notice me and match me.
Well, thanks for keeping out ahead of me, Adrien. We'll win this, but thanks for doing the hard work.
I hope everyone's enjoying him as much as I usually get to.
I'm glad I'm winning but... okay... I might be a jealous little-- a-a little jealous. Is all.
Hmph. I guess it's not that different than when you're modeling... but this is a lot more...

state.text: 『{Tikki}It's just a game, you don't need to be jealous!{!reset}』 He's just so handsome... how could I not want everyone to see how gorgeous he is?
Adrien... 『{Tikki}Marinette, you can stare later, but... your cards...{!reset}』

case.state: Adr-- Caadrien! Cat Noir! K-Kitty! I'm basically naked, c-can you either deal with the Akuma or hurry it up?
C-Cat Noir! If you don't hurry I'm-- I'll-- I'll be as big of a target for the Akuma as the dealer! I-it's so embarrassing!
Zut. I'd much rather be winning... but I don't think I'm that far behind you.
I guess I'm used to you being behind me. I think I could give that a try later, if you wanted...
I can't help myself... whenever you're like this, I feel the urge to take off my shirt... and since that's gone...
Whenever we're alone and you're shirtless, I'm really compelled to join you... I'm even compelled right now, you know...
Now then. I think this is the kind of difference in hands that we can both like, non, Adrien?
Oui, I'm rather liking how close this game is. I'm not opposed to plus en plus rapprochées, though.

state.text: Well... looks like there's no Akuma... so... really, it's only fair if I throw the next few-- 『{Tikki}Marinette! The game's still going! Adrien, talk sense into her-- and Plagg, stay quiet!{!reset}』
『{Tikki}It's up to you unless something Miraculous occurs... and I don't mean with magic jewels!{!reset}』 ...Sorry, I only caught that last part? Should I stop staring at his-- 『{Tikki}Yes!{!reset}』

case.state: Okay, Cat Noir! Stop playing around! I'm really in trouble over here!
...If your love for Ladybug means anything, maybe you'll stop me from having to expose myself in public!

state.text: H-hi, Adrien... I'm glad we don't need to keep pretending... but... I'm a little overwhelmed here. 『{Tikki}I'm pretty impressed! From what Plagg's told me, I expected him to be quicker to help.{!reset}』
『{Tikki}...Fortunately, it's starting to look like there's not even an Akuma here... but...{!reset}』 I'm having fun but... I wasn't expecting you to stay suited up so long...

case.state: Come on, Adrien, they can see my chest. Can't you go a little faster?
I know you usually don't have issues lasting... but I'm getting a little over all the foreplay, Kitty.
S-seriously? I-I don't have much left to lose, Adrien! C-can't you distract them a bit?
I-I-I'm plenty distracted-- I-I mean, I could use a distraction-- you look great but-- panties! M-my panties!

state.text: B-but you already took off a belt-- I-it was with your costume, but does that really count? 『{Tikki}...Or you could've worn a belt with your pants, Marinette...{!reset}』
...I almost wish I could just take off parts of my costume... I'd have had an extra round... 『{Tikki}Hm... why didn't you bring your purse, anyway?{!reset}』

case.state: ...H-how do I always forget how hot you are...? It's so crazy and I'm so lucky it's unfair...
Oh... Adrien... You're not making a great case for me staying in this game, you know.
We're neck and neck, Adrien! We can't lose... or if we do, we tried our best!
Way to catch up, Kitty. Win or lose, I forgive you for being such a scaredy cat.
Don't worry about the rest of them, oui? I know how good you are... and if everyone could see me, they'd see just how excited seeing you makes me.
Such a gentleman, letting me keep my panties on, non? But don't you think it's a lot easier to tell how badly I want you when they come off?
Adri-- C-Cat Noir... you know... I-I do like you with the suit on, but... I'd rather masturbate to the thought of it in private...
I-it's courteous for a gentleman to at least give a lady a hand, Adri-- Adricat. Catrdrien! C-Cat Noir!
...That took you a lot longer than I really expected, Adrien...
You know... sometimes finishing early isn't a bad thing... you kept me waiting...
Can't I layer myself with a few more Adriens? --E-er, not that I wouldn't want that, b-but I mean... Adrien, could you lose a few more layers?
I'm... not shy about my body, but... c-could you lose a few more layers, Kitty?
S-seriously? I-I don't have much left to lose, Adrien! C-can't you distract them a bit?
I-I-I'm plenty distracted-- I-I mean, I could use a distraction-- you look great but-- I-I'm going to have to... I-I'd rather it were you but you have so many layers left--
...You're lucky you're handsome... and I don't mind waiting...
This could be a far worse reveal than just a secret identity... but I'm glad you're doing this now.
So good of you to almost join me, handsome.
Hey, handsome. You're not going to keep playing cat and mouse with me for much longer, are you?
What a gentleman, so good of you to join me!
And I thought you were going to let me lose the game before you finished undressing. This is it, isn't it?
A-A-Adrien... I-I-I... I still need to...
I-I-I haven't even undressed! C-can you keep it together a little longer, Adrien?
It depends on the type of lie... I'd rather be honest, but if people knew my secret identity... er... I guess this game sort of defeats the purpose of that..
Well... I have to keep my identity a secret from people who really matter to me. So I'd be lying if I said I didn't have to lie... a lot.
Smoking...? No way! It's bad for you and everyone around you. It's the one type of villain I can't beat in a fight.
Smoking is gross and bad for you. I can't believe that people in this day and age want to pollute the air of the great city of Paris and their own bodies that way.
Not everyone's so lucky, but I love my family. They're a little sad I didn't inherit the family business, but I know they'd be proud of me if they knew I was a hero.
Well... I think my family is proud of me, because I love being part of it. They mean everything to me, even if I can never tell them that I'm a superhero.
I'd find a good cause and help them put it to good use. I don't think there's all that much I could do with it... it helps that money's not a huge issue to me.
A million dollars? I suppose I'd donate a lot to local shops. I can undo a lot of damage, but a little bit of extra cash goes a long way. I'm lucky that money isn't an issue for me, though...
I think everyone can learn from their mistakes. My entire set of powers is built to help people who're... basically just having the worst kinds of days.
Everyone has bad days. Forgiveness and fixing goes a long way. But there's a difference between a teachable moment and a major crime. I can't fix everything.
U-um... when I was younger I stole a lot of phones. I gave them back! B-but... I-I probably shouldn't have done that.
I... may have kind of sort stolen a lot of phones in order to delete embrrassing messages when I was younger. I gave them back but it's not an excuse...
I don't have any particularly interesting dark secrets... but sometimes I wish I'd have gotten the Cat Miraculous and used it to vent my frustrations as a teenager...

A dark secret...? Well... I guess my secret identity counts? You might see that later. If that's not enough... I love being Ladybug. But when I was younger, sometimes I wish I'd gotten the Cat Miraculous to destroy things and vent teenage angst.
I don't like liars... but I guess I'm not always honest about my hero work...
Liars are the worst kind of people. Unless you're trying to keep a secret identity. Then it's very different.
Merci, Cat Noir. But... don't spend your nine lives so quickly.
Don't worry for a second, Kitty. I know your luck is going to turn.
『{Tikki}I don't get to interact with Cat Noir too often... is he always this charming?{!reset}』 Well, not when he's suit-- no, not as Cat Noir...

Are you trying to impress my Kwami, Cat Noir? It's a remarquable impressionnant way to impress me, too. 『{Tikki}...Are you flirting with Cat Noir?{!reset}』 why not, Tikki? It's that kind of game, oui?
Oui, mon prince.
Well, as long as I still get to scratch you behind the ears and call you Kitty!
That inspires some confidence. But not total confidence.
That... helps me feel a little better... but I'm much more of a hands-on superhero, you know...
...Sigh. I'm fairly certain your nipples are... very... nice... but let's talk about something else, shall we?
It's a funny joke, but I know you of all people know you can see more of me in my costume...
Thanks for the pep talk, Kitty. But... maybe you should focus on the Akuma... where is that, by the way?
Well, Cat Noir, if that's coming from you, I think I can live with it.
Wow... that's... um... it's like you've seen me naked before... but then you'd... uh, clearly had to have... um... t-thank you?
At this point, I think your honesty's refreshing. Maybe I've checked you out too. You know... in uh, your costume! Because how else would I have done that!
『{Tikki}I can't imagine-- {!reset}』 O-oui... I... may have thought about it...
Oh... isn't it bad enough I'm already naked? You want me to admit that I've thought about you carrying me away from danger and-- 『{Tikki}Marinette, you haven't lost yet, so focus!{!reset}』
Don't count us out just yet, Kitty. Let's do it together!
No matter what, we're in this together. Let's take this villain down like we always do!
I trust you. I'd have called in help if I didn't. And... thank you.
I couldn't ask for a better partner. No matter who you are under your mask.
Is there even an Akuma-- 『{Tikki}I sure hope so, or else you just revealed your identity to Cat Noir and everyone else here for what, Marinette?{!reset}』
『{Tikki}...Are you two playing a prank on me...? {!reset}』 N-no, w-why? It's not like we know each other and there's no Akuma... ha-ha! That would be crazy! So crazy. And stupid. No, of course not!
Kitty! I knew you were a romantic... but you're so much more subtle like this. Is Plagg un mauvaise influence?
Where's this side of you when you're suited up, Kitty?
Do you prefer "Kitty" or "My prince"...? Or maybe just "Adrien, my--" 『{Tikki}Marinette, we've talked about not acting crazy... in public.{!reset}』

I'm not sure what kind of trouble you see. We're together, non? And I have the feeling there's some nice... frosting... for the cake that is the two of us. 『{Tikki}...Be careful how much cake you eat, Marinette.{!reset}』
I'm not going to go easy on you, Kitty! Game on!
Hey, I don't have gloves to take off, but I'm at my strongest barefoot. Think of all the games you've lost to me in Mecha Strikers IV!
Oh... don't you worry, Kitty. I'm always happy to lead. But don't think I'll keep going easy on you!
You lead plenty, Adrien. But your grace is appreciated, and I look forward to beating you from here on.
Oh... really? I should do this a little more often... maybe we skip the Akuma part.
C'est si? Nous allons y aller dans chez nous?
Well... since you asked... 『{Tikki}I guess you two never really outgrew that love square dynamic... {!reset}』
『{Tikki}It's not like I didn't know this about the two of you... but this is definitely... different.{!reset}』 Now you're both making me self-conscious...
About you and ~player~ throwing me-- Je ne le dirai pas en anglais...
You know me, Adrien. It's written all over my face, isn't it?
『{Tikki}Adrien's Kwami formally wishes for me to tell you that Adrien is having a great time.{!reset}』 ...Thanks, Tikki... I already got that sense.
I'm glad you're liking the view, at least, Adrien... 『{Tikki}You two are the most comfortable Cat Noir and Ladybug I've ever known... and I've known all of them!{!reset}』
Adrien, I've got this entirely under control. Don't worry either of your cute little heads!
I'm Ladybug. The Akuma's entirely handled. Don't worry Plagg's cute little head.
Adrien... hi... 『{Tikki}The only shocking thing is not only did you both reveal your identities... you did in public. {!reset}』
『{Tikki}It's bad enough you know each other's identities... did you have to reveal it to everyone else?{!reset}』 Well... life's too short not to have some fun, oui?
『{Tikki}...It can't be that simple, can it? I know she loves that jacket--{!reset}』 And he's so smart, too...

You should pay some more attention, Kitty cat. That's exactly why. 『{Tikki}I wonder what would happen if you were the blonde and he were the brunette... would your outfits actually be inverted colors...?{!reset}』
Well, you'd better unlace them, because I'm not losing this next hand!
You might want to get started, since I'm not holding back, Adrien!
We probably should, shouldn't we? ...Wait, where does Plagg find socks, if neither of us wear them...?
My shoes are pretty breathable, but... I guess we could probably start. ...Do neither of us...? Where does Plagg find...?
We had a full day before this! Of course I'd wear a bra instead of a belt... I enjoy the attention, but only with you, t'sais?
There's an eight piece limit! I might enjoy this, but I did want to bring a bra...
You don't make that sound so bad, my prince...
Kitty, you know you can just ask, and I'd do it for you, don't you? Because... you're my partner.
Adrien, I think your Kwami is hungry. Have you considered stuffing a sock in his mouth? It should help with those cheese cravings.
Plagg, se taire...
『{Tikki}I really enjoyed it when Marinette and Cat Noir interacted... they were both at their best, I think.{!reset}』 Well... we still can... and do... frequently... Um...

Hey there, Adrien. It was worth the long, hard wait, wasn't it? 『{Tikki}One of you revealing your identity to the other was bad enough... please don't make a habit of this... though I guess you both waited a while tonight...{!reset}』
Such a gentleman-- too bad I don't plan on losing!
You say that like I don't have your tail wrapped around my finger, Adrien. It's more fun when you make me work for it.
Oh, don't worry, you're going to get naked for me, I just needed to get a lucky streak going!
A ladybug can't change her spots... which means I'm not planning on losing, Adrien. Get ready to model.
Oh, I'm having lots of fun. Let me show you a few tricks, non? Watch and learn.
Now now, Kitty. Don't let me distract you now. I'm having plenty of fun.
And I thought life would get less complicated when I didn't have to choose between you, Cat Noir, and Luka... but you're great at keeping things interesting.
You never fail to keep things interesting, Adrien... I thought it'd get easier when I only had to pick between you, Cat Noir, and Luka... but you keep giving me more options...
I'm going to bring it home, Plagg. The win. And... maybe Cat Noir. He can certainly suit up after this, non?
Don't worry. I'm keeping my eye on the prize. Even if the view's a little much.
Oh la la... trying to distract everyone else, Kitty? You were already doing such a good job.
I think people who complain about misdirection never had to fight a giant, possessed... well, anything. Keep it up, Kitty!
Are you nervous? I'm not planning on losing, Kitty.
I've got nothing to lose! I know you're mine, my prince. I'm excited.
I know Ladybug strikes you silly, Kitty. But... I'm definitely flattered. It's not just you who's looking, though...
As long as you don't mind everyone else looking, too... who's idea was this game, anyway? It's fun... and really exciting.
...Well, if I'd known you were Cat Noir... it would've helped... 『{Tikki}...I really don't want Plagg to be right, Marinette... but...{!reset}』
You've gotten me out of that suit enough times by now, don't you think...? But yes. This view is worth it. 『{Tikki}Sigh. I'm happy you're both happy, but this is hardly heroic...{!reset}』
I certainly don't mind you showing off, Kitty. You're no stray to me!
Well... if you're sure, I can enjoy the show, Kitty. I do get to take you home.
It's not like you've changed your wardrobe since Collège... except for photoshoots.
Of course! Retro never goes out of style, don't you think?
C-Careful, Kitty! You might be letting a lot more out of your mouth if you don't watch it!
T-thanks but... w-watch what you're saying! I'd hate for people to get the wrong idea...! ...Or the right one...
A tempting offer... but I hope you don't mind solving this one with your own paws, Kitty.
I hate to leave you to your own devices... but I like watching those devices nonetheless.
I'm... the bodysuit still suits my body... This feels more exposed...
We may both love fashion, but you're the one that models, Adrien.
You're generous with your words and your... s-self.
As long as you like them... that's all that matters to me.
Don't show off too much, Kitty. You should save some for me.
I hope you don't intend on showing off for everyone but me, Kitty.
Adrien! Come on! Be patient! I'm still in this, you know!
The Akuma won't fix itself... though I have a feeling you'll be leaking and need a fix yourself!
I know that... but I was hoping I could get away with not losing at all... 『{Tikki}...Plagg, do you actually talk to Adrien about this?{!reset}』
『{Tikki}Humans are so complicated...{!reset}』 ...It's an awful lot less complicated when you suit up after a shower... and then don't have clothes...
Kitty, I... think the world of you. I'd just look at it like you protecting me.
You wouldn't think less of me if I lost, would you? Of course not! Don't worry. This is going to be fun for both of us.
You're really liking this look, aren't you?
If you like this look so much, maybe you should take me somewhere warm where it's easier to pull the look off...
You'll enjoy yourself plenty with this view, won't you?
Oh... are you that eager to show me off? I don't mind... but you're doing such a good job holding everyone's attention, I'd hate to steal the spotlight.
Even if I have to make you lose, I'm not giving up, Adrien! En garde!
Don't you worry for a second, pretty boy! With one layer, or zero, I'm going to win this!
I'd like to get closer... or have your hands on me... if I'm being honest...
...Personally, I'd rather if I were closer to you than this game were a close match...
Tikki, don't dignify that with a response. 『{Tikki}Your feet don't smell any worse than any other Ladybug's, I can say that much. {!reset}』
『{Tikki}...Are the puns or the foot jokes supposed to be the point of this?{!reset}』 ...I can think of something pointy. It's my foot. Going to a certain sensitive location.
I prefer the lights on when I'm being intimate. It's so special and I want to see all of them.
There's a lot to be said of touching your partner without seeing them... but I do really like to see a person I'm being intimate with.
I'd... never cheat on a partner. But... if all three people... or more... are okay, then it's okay, right?
O-of course not--! I... I'd never cheat on a partner... but if you mean sleeping with other people... well, they knew and were okay with it...
Absolutely not. If I were a boy, maybe, but that's for lack of an alternative. You don't eat a factory pastry when there's a home-cooked croissant in front of you. Literally.
No. I don't understand the fixation with putting things inside somewhere that's only supposed to have things come out of it when there's perfectly good alternatives...

I... I think the best kind of love is the kind that you can trust someone, even if it means they can enjoy things they can't enjoy with you. I... life's too short for one person, even if one person is your whole heart, I think.
Well... being a hero is really busy. So... in a way I'd prefer it? When I'm in love, I love someone so much it spills over... so having other people to enjoy and experience seems healthy?
If I haven't... er... gotten off... probably every few days?
T-that is really personal. But... I suppose this is the time to talk about that... Probably every few days if I haven't had an orgasm.
It's... um... I have a few complicating factors when it comes to watching adult films... so it's not a thing I do very often.
I actually don't watch pornography very often... when I do, it's mostly for the aesthetic sense. The human body in motion is a beautiful thing.
Hm... not every day... but a few times in a row is fun. Where you're just in bed, enjoying yourself?
I think a few times a day... but every couple of days. I really like to immerse myself in my partner, you know? Even if it's not every day.
Que'st que c'est... levrette... ah, it's... from behind. Though seeing my partner finish when I'm on top is very... fulfilling.
La levrette, if you must know. Though... I do like being on top, and seeing my partner's eyes.

For those of you that don't know, we're Ladybug and Cat Noir, the heroes of Paris! We protect the innocent from Hawk Moth, a supervillain that manipulates people's emotions so they become villains themselves!
Cat Noir and I are the protectors of Paris! We keep the city safe, mostly from Hawk Moth, a supervillain that manipulates people's emotions. Sort of like Dealer over there.

In case anyone was wondering... Ladybug and Cat Noir aren't supposed to know each other's secret identities. But... we do. And have for a while. Don't worry, we're not going to team up on the rest of you.
Adrien and I have known each other's secret identities for a little while... but it doesn't mean other people have to know that we know.

Hm... lots of heroes here tonight... er... proportionally... I mostly handle the actions of a magical supervillain, Hawk Moth. He possesses people on their worst days, and turns them into supervillains!
Looks like there's some other heroes here. Well, I'm what you'd call a street-level hero. I'm at my best, particularly, against magical villains that manipulate emotions.

...I guess I can break character a little. Look, I've heard about the Inventory. I know what kinds of games happen here.
I may be a hero, but I'm not a nun, and... today's picks are quite attractive...
You're kidding! You can't seriously think I've never heard about The Inventory! I'm here to have some fun too, you know? ...But it's a lot more fun to "be looking for Akuma," non?

I'm a hero, so of course I know about the Inventory! I'm here to have fun, just like the rest of you.
Though... maybe I should tone my luck down a bit, oui? ...I'll still "keep a lookout for Akuma," oui?
I can't say I've got that level of self-confidence, but if you're happy with your style, I say go for it, Nami.
Well, if you've got the confidence to deliver on it, there's nothing wrong with showing off what you've got!

『{Tikki}Plagg, it's a good thing Adrien's your partner...{!reset}』 Well, Tikki, I'm with Adrien, and you're there to balance out Plagg, right? Creation and Destruction... even if I'm a bit clumsier than Adrien, we're a great team!
Personally, I like that Tikki's aspect is Creation. 『{Tikki}I do like working with Adrien and Plagg... but you'll always be my favorite, Marinette.{!reset}』

state.text: 『{Tikki}Nami, I forgive you for calling me a bug. Marinette actually called me a bug mouse when she met me.{!reset}』 You've forgiven me, right? 『{Tikki}Of course! It's not wrong.{!reset}』

『{Tikki}Well... I do look a little bit like a bug.{!reset}』 I think I called you a bug mouse, the first time we met. 『{Tikki}I'd forgotten that... but I suppose if you're fine with it, so am I, Marinette.{!reset}』

case.state: 『{Tikki}Aren't you going to introduce me?{!reset}』 Oh, of course! Everyone, this is Tikki. She's my kwami... you know, like a guardian spirit. She represents the force of Creation.

Why don't you introduce yourself, Tikki? It's not like you have anything to take off, right? 『{Tikki}Hm... well, I'm Tikki. I'm a kwami, and kwamis represent aspects of the universe. My aspect is Creation.{!reset}』
This is a multiversal place, right? Well, I'm a superhero, and I protect Paris from Hawk Moth, a supervillain that manipulate's people's negative emotions.
Looks like I'm the only major hero here. If you need help after the game, let me know. I'm normally used to dealing with supervillains... but I'm up to any kind of test.
So... quite a lot of different styles here tonight! What's everyone's favorite outfit? ...Or are you wearing it already?

I'm sort of lucky. Er... even when I'm not Ladybug! Because... 『{Tikki}Words, Marinette!{!reset}』
What's everyone's favorite outfit?

I'm really impressed with everyone's sense of style!
Did you all wear your favorite outfits tonight? I know I did... even if I'm just wearing my normal clothes, they're so familiar, oui?
So... does anyone like to bake? I'm pretty good at it, even if I'm not as good as my parents.
If you need a tour around Paris, you can do a lot worse than Ladybug, you know. I know it like the back of my hand.
I wouldn't be doing much of a good job as Ladybug if I didn't remind everyone to keep their cool. We all have our bad moments... but it's just a game!
It was actually Tikki who told me about this place. She thought it'd help me take the edge off... um... intimately.
This place is under a confidentiality agreement, right? What happenes here... stays here, oui?
Quiet and clever. But I guess it's not that subtle, is it?
It does, Komi-san. And well, my partner already did, so what's stopping me?
W-well, it's kind of complicated...
Huh? What do you mean?
What... huh? But you already finished and are doing such a good job with your words...

『{Tikki}Marinette... Plagg and I will outlive you and Adrien... don't let him hold this over me... {!reset}』 I hope the three of you don't think I'm so easy to beat. But... I guess actions speak louder than words.

It looks like you and Plagg have a bit of a competition, Tikki... and Adrien, you know I can win on my own, don't you? 『{Tikki}Marinette's going to win, Plagg! Even in a lascivious game like this!{!reset}』
Yes, whatever would he do without knowing my identity, Plagg.
I see that Tikki gives better advice than your Kwami, Adrien...
Adrien... thanks for sticking with me this whole time.
...I'm sorry you ended up so far behind... but I appreciate the defense, Cat Noir.
...Seriously? We're on the same team here! Get catty AFTER we get the Akuma.
Come on, gloat after we've gotten the Akuma!
Super, c’est juste super. Unless another part of your costume comes off, this isn't great news, because mine's a one piece!
Cat Noir, we can't afford to lose again! What'll happen if our identities get revealed!?
Adrien, don't listen to Plagg. I'm sure we can talk about this... after the game.
Don't worry, Kitty. Let me finish up with the Akuma and then... maybe I'll take off my mask.
W-watch it, Cadrien-- C-Cat Noir... Adrien!
H-Hey! W-wait a second! A-Adrien!
I've got a game to win, Adrien... but I'll definitely consider having Ladybug take Adrien Agreste out for a swing through Paris!
I think you're much cuter out of your costume, Kitty. This is much better attire for taking you out on the town.
It is tempting... but I think you're already spent, Adrien.
Well, you've already had so much fun without me, who am I to ruin that?
Oh no-- Looks like time's up! Cat Noir, take care of the Akuma!
You have to take care of the Akuma, Cat Noir! I'm leaving it to you!
It's all up to you, Cat Noir... But if I had a hiding place left, you'd know where it was, wouldn't you?
I warned you not to be reckless... you've got this, don't you?
As much as I just want to give you credit, everyone else did their part too, Kitty.
I think it's only fair. You showed me your secret identity...
Plagg, you're making it sound like I made Adrien lose all those rounds...
Plagg, you're ruining the dynamic here... but I guess undressing as a team is, also...
I guess there isn't much point in hiding it... looks like there's no Akuma, anyway.
Plagg's speaking sense for once. I hope this gets you going, Kitty.
Sorry, Adrien...
Well... at least you're having fun, right? Let's see if I can't win this for the both of us.
F-focus on the Akuma! I'm just taking off my shoes, anyway-- 『{Tikki}Cat Noir! You have to get rid of the Akuma before she... you know! Has to... you know.{!reset}』
I'm just taking off my shoes, s-so w-why do my eyes wander? I mean-- why would anyone's-- I mean-- why would I be embarrassed? 『{Tikki}Because it's only large stuff after that!? {!reset}』
T-That's not-- there's plenty ways for this to get worse, Cat Noir! 『{Tikki}Just because it can get worse doesn't mean the reveal wasn't a big deal!{!reset}』
I-I'm not exactly dressed for winter over here, and that means-- 『{Tikki}Cat Noir, she's still showing a lot more than you are!{!reset}』
You might be in the lead, now, Adrien, but don't think you'll keep it!
It's nice that you're being so competitive when you already know what I'm wearing... and what I'm like when I'm wearing nothing at all...
『{Tikki}...It seems like a problem that Adrien can't contain himself and you need to restrain him...{!reset}』 A tempting problem to fix, Tikki...
Let's see how much fun we end up having. I can always suit back up. 『{Tikki}...I really hope you're not using our yo-yo for lewd purposes...{!reset}』
Thanks for the offer... at least my shoes can keep me standing.
Thanks, Adrien. I think my shoes'll do the hard work.
A-ah! It's so distracting when you do this!
Aww, Kitty, I still have a crush on you. But beating you at games is far too fun.
Your butt's too nice not to spank. So don't complain!
It's flattering to know you still think about me, even when I'm just taking off my shoes.
You never stop being sweet, do you, Adrien?
Well, it's hard for me not to agree with you when you say it like that.
You're precious, but... I think you should play better next time.
You know, Kitty, just because I've taken my shoes off doesn't mean I'm going to stay the night...
Did the sight of my feet set you off, Kitty?
I thought taking off our costumes would be more interesting than taking off our shirts, but...
We have a few more hands before this really picks up...
Way to give away the surprise! But... you're not wrong.
I do like to match up with you. But... the match I'm more interested in is winning this one!
You're not about to make me slip up, Adrien.
Speaking of overconfidence...
...Which head are you thinking with?
...I think that applies more to you, than me right now, Kitty.
A-Adrien! Y-you can't be serious!
Tu n'es pas sérieux!
...Well, you did put on a good show, Kitty...
Oh... you know, if you maintain a fantasy even after you've finished, I'd be a bad partner not to indulge it a little...
I always knew you had a protective instinct... but it's especially nice tonight, Cat Noir...
If I'd known you had such a protective instinct...
Aww... I wanted them to find out for themselves!
I'd thought it'd make a nice theming, given... we did show up in costume...
I continue to lead the way! In fashion and in our teamwork.
You're more than welcome to take a few losses for me... but you're not exactly wrong, Kitty.
『{Tikki}She's a slim hero... of course her clothes are form-fitting...{!reset}』 ...I think they're calling you fat, Tikki.

...It'd be rude to have brought more than eight layers... 『{Tikki}I'm just glad you didn't count me as one... {!reset}』 ...You're not Plagg, Tikki! I'd like you by my side until-- well... when it gets obvious.
Well... let's see if you can't carry me.
You might need to carry me if this keeps up...
What's that even supposed to mean?
...Whatever could you mean, Adrien?
H-he's not wrong... but everyone's getting to watch my partner masturbate...!
H-he's obviously correct-- but... I'd rather the attention be on-- w-wait!
Oui? Who's to say I couldn't let both of you help?
Oh? Are you sure you don't want to have someone else help me?
At this point, I'd be almost offended if you didn't.
I know you look at Ladybug... why'd Marinette be any different, Kitty?
Y-yeah... I'm s-sure your intentions are totally pure.
I-I know you well enough to know that your intentions aren't pure. Except maybe pure lust...
I prefer you in a tailored suit... or a magical bodysuit... but this pairs well.
Aww, you don't want us to become that couple that matches, do you? I thought our dynamic symmetry was plenty good as is.
Not a photoshoot... but maybe a keepsake shot or two?
A photoshoot? No... but maybe one or two... pictures...
...Wow, Plagg has a point. 『{Tikki}But... why would you even need a belt? The pants fit perfectly... or did.{!reset}』
『{Tikki}Plagg... actually has a point, I think.{!reset}』 ...I didn't even bring my purse! That's way more iconic than a belt...
It's not my fault! I've been eating baked goods since I was a kid, and that was before I started running kilometers along the roofs of Paris, so I didn't even wear--
Don't blame me for my metabolism-- i-if that's what you were doing--
Such a romantic. Stop me if I swoon! ...A-Actually, stop me if I swoon.
Quite the charmer-- but... I think I like to charm your snake rather than Snake Noir, Adrien.
Aww, I never get tired of hearing your compliments... I don't really mind the others tonight, either.
That's a deal.
Don't be shy now, Ad-- Cat Noir.
Aw, Ad-- Cat Noir. I-I... you can look.
I-I... w-well... I suppose it's nice that everyone can know that your partner's attractive...
I... if you're happy and having fun with that...
I'm still Ladybug even if I'm suited up or suiting down, oui?
It's always exciting to me, too... but... I'll always be happier if this view makes you happy.
Adrien, do you think you could focus more on the flirting and less on the clever?
The boy's about to get me naked and he decides to get smart.
The only spots I like, light or otherwise, are the ones on my costume.
When you transform, don't you feel like you're in the spotlight?
I hope I can win before you finish...
If I'm going to lose, I hope that it's not after you're done...
It is rather refreshing to know it's not just you...
I'd hardly complain if you'd have fun with me and... well...
Of all the things you're good at... did you really need to be good at poker, too?
I'm just as surprised as you are...
Well, just because you're not fully enjoying it doesn't mean everyone else isn't!
Oh, come on. You can admit that you like me showing me off.
You've been my partner the longest and know me best... but I hope you don't mind bringing someone else up on the ropes...
I wouldn't mind you teaching someone else a few tricks...
I'd love that... but I also think we should make the most of this game, Kitty.
You're more than welcome to... but I think we should see how the rest of this game goes.
Oh... do you think so? Oh, wait, really? I... hm...!
Oui. Or... oui...?
This is a lot more fun when it's close... just like you, my prince. I know that look in your eye...
You did the honors of going first, Adrien... it'd be rude of me not to indulge you a bit now...
You'll have plenty of time to recharge, won't you?
I hope you don't plan to simply cum and be done, Adrien... there's so much more to enjoy tonight!
Well... not quite, Jessie. I'm a superhero. But I can do some neat yo-yo tricks.
I think we're both well-known stars in our own circles... but I'm a superhero, not a performer.
If you're excited to see me out of my costume... well, I did wear clothes under this, you know.
Don't worry, Komi-san. I may have come prepared for this.

state.text: 『{Tikki}Marinette... shouldn't you have brought some sweets to give to your new friends?{!reset}』 I-I do live in a bakery, Shouko. Ms. Komi. Komi-san...

case.state: It's actually a modification on an Agreste jacket... like Adrien... A-ahem...
Well... It seems that way, but... it's not that complicated. Sometimes responsibilities come your way, and you just have to accept them.

Tikki's very real, and she can speak for herself. But I think it's my turn... 『{Tikki}I'm a magical spirit called a Kwami, Meia. I still eat and can be touched, but I'm not something that's born, lives, and dies.{!reset}』

『{Tikki}Q-Chan sounds more like a machine, like Max's Markov... but I'm a physical spirit, if that's what you mean, Meia.{!reset}』 ...Well said, Tikki. I can tell you more about her if you'd like, Meia, but first I have to undress.
Strawber-- it's... Ladybug themed, actually.
Well... Nami... it's Ladybug themed, actually.
It's a shame your friend's going to miss me taking my yo-yo off. I'd happily sign one, if you happen to have it.
Aww... well, I'd be happy to sign one. I'm glad someone appreciates me for the more... finesse-based parts of my work!
I am winning... and there doesn't really seem to be an akuma here...
...I'll admit, it's a little unfair to have so much luck. I'll wind it back in...
Sorry for taking so long... I'm un peu compétitif.
Well... it's not like I wasn't prepared to lose... though, given how lucky I am, I did have to cheat by throwing cards away... !
Hm... maybe... I shouldn't have lost my edge...
You can take one last look... I'm... rather less impressive outside of my suit, but who doesn't look good in magic latex?
Well... things were going pretty much my way, so I can hardly complain...
It's kind of a shame... I almost think you could see more of me when I was in my costume...
I'm still winning, so... pardon me if I don't want to give up my advantage just yet.
But I had such a good lead... 『{Tikki}Don't be a sore winner, Marinette... {!reset}』
I guess I should take off my jacket... 『{Tikki}You could take off your pants, but you'd look kind of disorganized...{!reset}』
『{Tikki}...You haven't put any thought into what you'd take off if you lost, have you?{!reset}』 ...It has to be my jacket, right? It's not like I can take my bra off under my shirt...
Took you a while, but...
It wouldn't be all that heroic of me if I didn't make this worth it, would it?
Aww... you got me. Well... I guess you'll get to see what's under under my costume.
At least I have the farthest to go before I lose...
I'm putting up a pretty good fight, oui?
You're really, really working for this, aren't you?
...Ce n'est pas trop tôt...
I've been ready for a little while now...
Um... I've been playing with this strap for a while... glad I can finally take it... off...
I guess it's time to show off my ladybottoms...
Took you all long enough...
I readied getting pretty-- I-I'm pretty ready for the next part.
Well... I'm not winning super hard... so let's go with something small.
Okay, I've got it! De rien--
I'll start with something small... but not something insignificant.
Well, looks like you're all playing well... time to dial back my luck a little bit.
Hm... this is kind of challenging. I think you'll like this next part.
People don't usually get to see this next part... but... I hope you enjoy it as much as I do!
I hate to be a tease... but if you want me to show more skin, you've got a few rounds of me left!
I'm pretty competitive when it comes to games. Don't think I'm going to go easy on you now that I'm out of my costume.
Not bad... but I've still got a few charms and tricks besides my great sense of fashion.
This is pretty close-- not that I want to get close to anyone-- I mean, I'm right here, you're right there, we're all undressing, how close would we-- a-anyway...
...I'm not winning by a whole lot... or maybe even at all, am I? That's okay, it's totally fine. I just need to take off my shirt. So...
I'm not trying to surrender... that's a bad stereotype... but I'm... wow, you all really brought your best... so... shirt... I mean... shirt!
We're... we're all getting awfully naked... most of the time I just get to watch...
Oh! My turn? That's fine. Strip? J’ai la flemme! Oh... okay... well... Er...
...I'm kind of wishing I wore my cute sous-vêtements. The ones I have on are comfortable, but not exactly... my best.
You did beat me fairly...
I hardly think I'm anything special... well... I'm just a normal girl with a normal life... besides the superheroics. So... my chest's assez moyen...
In Paris, there's quite a few people who'd prefer women not need to cover their chests... mine's not that impressive, so I'm less worried about the stares...
I'm just going to do it! I'm excited but... a little nervous... so no sense in waiting!
Well... I hope this doesn't surprise anyone...
I suppose most people haven't seen what a woman with blue hair looks like when she doesn't shave it all off... non?
Way to keep up, but I'm not done just yet! 『{Tikki}They'd probably like if it you took off something big...{!reset}』 Well... why not something important?
『{Tikki}...Are you going to do something scatterbrained, or...?{!reset}』 I'm not feeling particularly shy... so I'll just take off my jacket.

I guess... I can't count Tikki, can I?
『{Tikki}Marinette!{!reset}』
You know I'd never let you go like that! You're just running out of places to hide!
Ladybug always saves Paris from destruction... but who saves Marinette from having to embarrass herself?
Me already again? A-again already? Se prendre un râteau--
H-hold on! I want to play fair but... um... err... urk--
Huh? Wait a second-- seriously? I'm already... well...
Ack! I wasn't really expecting to lose so soon...
You're putting a rabbit on me, and Bunnix isn't even here! I...
Oh-- uh-- er-- um-- hold on, I should--
...I don't suppose you'd let me have my yo-yo so I can do my Lucky Charm?
Wait a second-- Pouvez vois-- sans déc--!
I didn't really expect to be behind... 『{Tikki}Well, if you don't want to show your behind, you should probably pick soon...{!reset}』

『{Tikki}Marinette, didn't you want to come and play? {!reset}』 Well, I did want to do both of those things...
『{Tikki}What do you-- Ah! Never you mind!{!reset}』
I thought I'd be doing a little better than this, Tikki... 『{Tikki}Even if you lose, there's a lesson to be learned...{!reset}』 I guess you're right...
Winning or losing-- I can do this. Okay, everyone, here I... go?
...I'm a little curious if people... are going to like what they see...
I might be behind a little bit, but I'm not giving up. Ladybug never gives up, and neither does Marinette!
Ah... zut.
...I could do something rather courageous and rather stupid... but let's...
Se lave men, siye l'atè...
...Okay. I guess it's... um... time.
Well... I'm a little embarassed, but I think someone's going to be happy with my... assets.
I guess nobody can lick them if they're still in the bra-- I-I mean... l-let me just...
Mmmh? Well... I guess you've seen everything else...
It's not that I came-- you know, like, arrived here, not-- climax-- though-- it's looking like-- um... let me just take off my underwear...
...I guess this game wouldn't be any fun if there wasn't a chance of getting undressed... t-truth be told I'm... pretty excited to... you know...
Cat Noir, now's really not the time!
Kitty, did the cat get your brain along with your tongue, think! And not just with your... about my...
I trust you, Kitty, but... let's be confident, not cocky.
Let's not get cocky, Kitty. You might not have lost yet, but we need to plan ahead!
Trust me when I say that this is hardly a surprise to me. So... why not save some surprises for you?
Don't worry. I'm not the impulsive one between us. I plan to win, so, the least you deserve is something special.
Just keep an eye out for the Akuma, Adrien. I think you're a little nicer when you and Plagg are separate.
While I think Cat Noir's flirting is charming, I have to say, I like this dynamic-- where I'm in my costume, and you're a handsome, sweet model.
Don't worry, Adrien. After this... well, maybe it is time to reveal our secret identities...
I don't think this is the place... but maybe I can reveal my secret identity later?
Adrien... you know that this is an exception. We can't just reveal our identities... but...
I'd make a joke, but you losing the next round is pretty plausible...
You did manage to lose an entire game of strip poker before I lost a single hand...
I'm lucky... but I don't think it's a coincidence you're having your forfeit before I've even taken anything off.
Just think of the kind of striptease I could do if you hadn't... used your Cataclysm already...
But you've already used your finishing move, anyway... I'm not sure there's anything in this for me at this point.
Cat Noir, take care of the Akuma! Tikki-- Spots off!
It's up to you, Kitty! I couldn't be in better hands!
...Well... that's a relief, at very least.
I'm counting on you to be right, Adrien!
For a man with such a way with words when you're transformed, you're a lot more bashful without your mask.
Spots off! Though I can spot someone who's very on, Adrien!
This has certainly been a different experience, though. Good thing there wasn't an Akuma... I hope. Spots off!
Spots off! While we don't do this thing all the time... it's nice to make new friends... speaking of, there isn't an Akuma, right...?
Spots off! Aren't you being sweet for a man who lied about there being an Akuma.
Détransforme-moi! This has been fun... but everyone here has to swear themselves to secrecy... okay!
Next time, I'll go first, Kitty. Spots off!
Don't worry, Adrien... I'll make this up to you later. I promise. Spots off!
Uhh... Cat Noir, why would you ask that...? I do have several pairs...
I... have several pairs but... that's s-surely just what's in style, right?
I appreciate the offer and the praise... but let me lose with grace, won't you?
They're just shoes... it's not like it's going to be awful on my toes... I hope.
...Anyway, who's to say that we do those things behind closed doors, anyway?
Would it surprise anyone to find out one of us is into being tied up? ...Or at least, one.
I was joking... mostly! ...You do sometimes smell like cheese, Adrien.
Adrien... with how often you have to feed Plagg, I just assumed that smell was cheese...
B-but-- y-you're so distracting!
I-I-- I must have used up all my confidence as Ladybug--
Do I really strike you as the jealous type?
...You're not trying to make me jealous, are you?
Oh... I guess I could use my feet sometime, if you wanted...
Oh! You're into that? I guess we could try it sometime...
Don't worry, I'm still baking after this...
Well... after we get you cleaned up, maybe we should bake something together?
And what would you know about my jacket, Cat Noir?
You say that like you know something I don't. Have you been a peeping tom, Cat Noir?
Confident words for a man who just tried to raise the ante...
You know, we could have fun tonight. Or I can, alone. Be careful, Adrien...
Adrien... I think so too. But it is a lot more fun when there's a power dynamic...
Aww, Adrien...
We're a good team... so maybe we can keep this up all game. Your turn, next.
Well... I agree, so why don't you lose the next hand?
How about keeping it in your pants, Kitty? Oh, wait.
I've seen you naked, Adrien... and I know I'll be giving everyone else the same chance. Just don't rush it.
It's one of Agreste's most popular looks. And it's a classic! It's vintage! How else could I feel about it?
It's almost a decade old and still looks great. And it always reminds me of you...
...Well... if it makes you happy to think about, Adrien, sure.
...Hm... I suppose using my feet could be a lot less messy... or a lot more...
You might have made a mess, but I like the messes you make... I can't help smiling, oui?
The idea of you making a mess in me is hardly the worst thought in the world...
H-Hey! What happened to what you were just saying!
I was enjoying you protecting me! I didn't know you wanted the attention for yourself! That's-- it's utterly ridiculous is what it is!
Oh...! So you are wearing--
...Sigh. I'm thinking of the Banananoir costume... or maybe just your banana now--
You're assuming someone else doesn't make me a sore winner first. I'd be careful about bragging so soon...
Confidence is attractive, but you hardly need to gloat...
Flattery won't get you everywhere, Kitty.
You're charming enough not to bother flattering me, you know...
E-erm... I do like being Lady Noir...
Being Lady Noir is a fun change of pace... but I wish Plagg picked his wording a bit more carefully...
I hope you don't mind making a mess on your own if you lose the next hand...
Normally, I like your messes...
It's not because they're Ladybug-themed... I just think they match my sense of style!
My sense of style informs what I wear... even when nobody but you can see it, Adrien... though...
And after all that talk of taking me home tonight...
For a boy who makes a big speech about taking me home... you certainly have an interesting thought process... very interesting...
I think the boundary around my secret identity's long gone, Kitty. Let's enjoy ourselves tonight.
Oh... come on. You've never, ever wondered what kind of panties Ladybug wears...?
Pure intentions-- pure nonsense, maybe!
I think you're purely interested in having people look at me naked!
I think you just like taking me back for yourself...
Well... there are some rather impressive people here tonight...
Hm... but... wouldn't that mean Ladybug was sending lewd photos...?
...Then again, what would people say if they knew Ladybug was texting...?
Oooh... maybe we could try getting you to wear a bra instead of a belt next game...
It's okay, Adrien. I don't hold you accountable for what Plagg says... mostly.
What, you don't like the way I look?
If you want to make fun of my buns, focus on my baking, Adrien...
You're not going to get shy now, are you?
Careful, Adrien, I'd hate to lose your attention now. I spent years earning it.
Did you spend a lot of time thinking about how to compliment? Or are you trying to give everyone else some pointers?
Oh... he definitely likes the company tonight. But, Kitty, do you think you should've spent more time learning to play cards and less time practicing pick up lines?
Isn't the cat supposed to have my tongue?
Stop talking, Kitty. And watch.
Okay... I'll admit the attention isn't so bad...
I think I'd have changed my costume a lot more if the attention was all bad...
Well... we could always feel each other, if you want to have some high-strung emotions...
If this doesn't get people happy... w-wait... what if?
Besides. I think I've got more appeal.
You're a tough act to follow, but I get the feeling people'll be plenty happy to see both of us strip.
Even when you say it, it still doesn't seem to be quite the positive I'd like it to be, you know...
I know you're trying to be nice, but hardly the time...
Kitty, you make the game better...
I think I get enough attention from you alone... but this is definitely a new way to have fun...
Oh, I wouldn't go that far. If you're worried about jealousy, maybe you'd like to watch me have some fun with someone else?
It wouldn't be the first time we have some fun with someone else... are you up for that night, Kitty?
Well, if a superhero says it, it'd be rude for anyone else to disagree, wouldn't you say?
I do try to look nice... and feel better.
Don't remind me if you won't be taking care of me, Adrien...
Oouf.
...Ah... this is still a little much, non...?
Adrien...
Well, I'm the luckiest girl in the world. So... you're needlessly lucky, Adrien.
...How am I supposed to respond to that? You're too sweet...
He's right but... everyone likes to be appreciated!
Adrien's not wrong... but it doesn't mean it's a huge thing for me or anything!
Maybe we should bring home a friend and each of us tie you up...?
Wow! Really? That's so much fun to tie you up.
I can't think of anything, anywhere, or any... else... I'd rather enjoy right now, Adrien.
I'm having a great time, Adrien, just lose yourself in the moment, mmhmm?
Well...
I don't think we should cheat... but what's cheating and what's more... open is fine.
That being said... I just... I really like being creative, and doing it in a way you can carry it with you.
It'll be my pleasure. I've got a pen in here somewhere! A yo-yo is a versatile tool, after all.
That's a good point... and bad things have happened when it's fallen into the wrong hands... but I have a feeling it'll be perfectly sfae tonight.
It's magic and it helps me fight villains.
Well... you fight with something that's not a sword, or magic, or a gun, right? Hence, a yo-yo.
Ah, I'm just taking off the layer I promised, Nami. Detransforme moi!
Don't worry, Nami. Nothing bad. Spots off!
Tikki, spots off--! And thanks, Hilda!
So... I get the feeling I'm not the first girl here to be insecure about her chest... don't worry though, I'm more or less happy about it...
Don't worry. I'm happy with my chest but... I don't think I'm the only woman here who could be plus joyeux, non?
I'll put my yo-yo in the pile. I'll need it back later, though. It'll disappear if you can get me out of my costume.
Before anyone asks... no, the mask and ribbons don't come off. I guess I'll leave it to your imagination what's next.
If you do manage to beat me, I'm not naked under my suit. ...Though it feels that way... and maybe looks a bit like I am.
Spots off!
Détransforme-moi!
Taches off!
...You've kind of seen my butt, oui...? Don't mind me if I sit on it while I take my shoes off...
Hm... the floor's not... well... I actually think it's pretty clean, though that might just be me.
I'm on the run most parts of most days... so I actually keep a few pairs of these for when they wear through...
...I've had this jacket for like nine years now. I've actually had to tailor it a little bit... but I'm still really happy with how it looks.
Ladybug's got some pretty fantastic motifs... but I'm a big fan of this jacket. When I'm a famous, successful fashion designer... I hope it's part of my look, you know?
This jacket has some really important sentimental value to me... so let's make sure it's well taken care of, oui?
...I know this might be a bit cliche...
Before anyone asks... I do own other bras, and they don't all look like this...
Well... it's not like I'm hiding anything under my shirt... but...
I know these aren't the most fashionable-- er... not my pants, but... well... d-depending on where... you're from...
Sorry in advance that I'm not wearing très sexy underwear... but I'm hoping the girl wearing them is more than enough.
Not that I'm not a fan of the topless-with-jeans look... but...
I'm a little nervous... but also pretty... excited...
It's really okay, you know? C'est pas grave, tu sais...
I guess it's time to see my spots, non?
I can tell you're not working with Hawk Moth... you'd be far more interested in my earrings.
Well... I do prefer a stylish approach to myself...
Wearing a skintight bodysuit doesn't lend itself well to the all-natural look, obviously...
Hey... is it true that some people are really into feet? I can get behind liking legs or butts... or understand how it must feel to caress a breast... but feet?
I'm not naturally-- well, not unnaturally, but not supernaturally-- I-I'm not awkward by choice... just sometimes I get in over my head...
I know shoes don't do it for most of you... but these are some of my favorite flats!
...This jacket's really important to me... you're welcome to compliment me or it... just don't let it get damaged, please.
I've had this jacket for so long... I've worked on a lot of projects, myself included... but it's always a staple of my work... and um, really has used a few staples when I've resewn frayed bits!
Être bien dans sa peau... except... you know, you do need recognition in fashion...
...I can do this. Comme aller à la plage...
I-I do like to... have a certain flair... b-but not all of my underwear are hero themed...
...Um... I always... people do... have some compliments for Ladybug... but I'm cute, right?
Of all the times... I haven't... the... the button's stuck! I haven't been eating too many croissants, I swear!
Huh?! It's... um... n-nevermind...
So... I guess this is the downside of skinny jeans... Um... merci, pardon...
I'm a little self-conscious... but not that...
...If you like them, just let me know. If you don't... ta gueule...
You're going to see a superhero's chest. I think it's pretty super, don't you?
Wait-- Tikki, are you tired already?
H-huh? I-- wait-- zut--
I'm already done with my transformation--!?
I wasn't really expecting this, but I always have a plan.
It's not like I'm not tactical about how I beat supervillains... so I know well enough to put my yo-yo in the pile...
I'll put my yo-yo in for now... but I don't plan to keep losing.
I... I don't shave it or anything, but I do trim it nicely...
I just like the way this looks...
Um... I have a confession... I'm a bit ready to get off-- get these off-- e-erk...

state.text: Sorry if that's a bit disappointing, Komi-san... but he's my boyfriend. 『{Tikki}...and I'm her kwami, Tikki... and I'm always challenged by how eager these two are to... do this.{!reset}』
『{Tikki}Marinette! ...And Adrien. Oh. Hello, Plagg... {!reset}』 I hope it's not too much of a surprise but... Adrien and I have known each other's identity for a little while, at least.

case.state: Wait... where does he keep finding those?
...Come to think of it, wouldn't wearing socks cut down how often we have to clean our shoes...? Not fashionable, I guess...
I'll hold you to that, Kitty. Let's have a good time after we take the time to do good.
As much as I trust you to think things through, I'm happy to let you be the muscle. We're still going to win this... together.
I'm not sure that's romance I'm smelling, Cat Noir. And trust me, I spend all night with you.
You're right, Cat Noir, but romance and roses are going to have to wait until after we deal with the Akuma! We might not have that much longer if we lose another hand!
Thanks, Adrien. I'm glad this didn't... I'm glad I didn't get awkward about this.
I appreciate the vote of confidence. It means a lot coming from you, Adrien.
Oh... Adrien, I'm sorry for making you wait so long... Hang in there. We're still a team, and we're still going to win this.
Where was this side of Cat Noir all those years ago, Adrien? Don't worry. I still need you. Let's win for the both of us. This Akuma is going down!
Oh la la... well... why don't you be a good Kitty, and wait and see?
Oh la la... let's worry about the Akuma for now, and worry about the rest later.
Oui-- non, yes, wait-- W-we... I guess... I guess there's not that much harm... in admitting that we...
I... I guess if I lose the next hand, it'll already be too late, won't it...? I-I can be honest that you're very special to me. Inside your costume, and out of it.
I might know a thing or two about you, Adrien... hehehe. And I do know very well what you enjoy.
I think you'd enjoy it. I do have a pretty good grasp on what you're like, after all.
You make a compelling case, Kitty. But... Let's talk shop after we finish the game.
Make losing sound so good, and I might just do it, Adrien...
『{Tikki}Oooh, did we get the-- AH! You detransformed in front of Cat Noir!? In public--{!reset}』 Sorry, Cat Noir, am I familiar to you, like this?

『{Tikki}Marinette! You shouldn't transform in front of each other... in public--{!reset}』 Hi, this is Tikki, I'm Marinette... and it seems like you know me from somewhere, Cat Noir, which means I know you, non?
The man of my dreams and the best partner I could ask for... well, after Tikki, of course. 『{Tikki}Please tell me you didn't both just reveal yourselves to other people too!{!reset}』
『{Tikki}We got the Akuma, didn't weeee-- aaaah!{!reset}』 Well, everyone's already met Plagg... this is Tikki... and I'm always happy to take my costume off for you, Adrien.
I don't really like to mix work and play... but if we're working so hard... I guess playing hard is in the books, isn't it?
...Well, it was sweet of you to lose those hands, though I have to agree with Tikki on this one...
